titleStmt.title: Two letters containing a further justification of the Church of England against the dissenters the first by one of the reverend commissioners for the review of the liturgy, at the Savoy, 1661 ; the second by Dr. Laurence Womock, Archdeacon of Suffolk, author of the Verdict upon melius inquirendum.
titleStmt.author: Pierce, Thomas, 1622-1691.
Womock, Laurence, 1612-1685.

titleStmt.title: Two letters containing a further justification of the Church of England against the dissenters the first by one of the reverend commissioners for the review of the liturgy, at the Savoy, 1661 ; the second by Dr. Laurence Womock, Archdeacon of Suffolk, author of the Verdict upon melius inquirendum.
titleStmt.author: Pierce, Thomas, 1622-1691.
Womock, Laurence, 1612-1685.

notesStmt.note: First letter attributed by Wing to Thomas Pierce.
With: The verdict upon the dissenters plea occasioned by their melius inquirendum. London, Printed for Robert Clavel ..., 1681. (Wing W3356)
Imperfect: stained, with print show-through and loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
